quote: Cause channeled in the wrong direction is indistinguishable from handcap
author: Dr Lloyd Magangeni

quote: Some say sky is the limit but I say your assignment is the limit
author: Dr Lloyd Magangeni

quote: Success is the progressive discovery of your assignment
author: Dr Lloyd Magangeni

quote: Believe in yourself, you can do great things!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The quest for learning is the quest for self-discovery.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Life gives us many test. We must graciously take each test!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: On the journey to self discovery be grateful for the fools along the way. Their lack of kindness fueled your success ~bns
author: Bluenscottish

quote: It's success, which makes you beautiful.
author: Ameya Agrawal, A Leap Within

quote: The greatest challenge in life is discovering who you are, The second greatest is being happy with what you find.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Complaining solves nothing but creative problem solving amongst people with a common focus will produce solutions.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Stop rejecting that unique pathway that was designed exclusively for you. Embrace your destiny, respect yourself and love others.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: You can only give yourself a chance to find right things when you stop chasing wrong things.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: You have immense power--power to overcome, power to achieve, power to possess, and power to prosper, making you incredibly irresistible.
author: Anitra Shelton-Quinn, Becoming Incredibly Irresistible: A Guide to Living the Abundant Life

quote: Success is like a seed, it waits for the right conditions that will allow it to grow.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Success is like a rainbow
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Hard work is a prophet
author: it foretells success. Diligence is a prophet

quote: Desire to seek, desire to learn.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The quality of a man is to be judged not by what he drives but by what drives him
author: Agona Apell, The Success Genome Unravelled: Turning Men from Rot to Rock

quote: Every success and every bit of progress, is a building block for your next step.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: If you have the dedication, means and patience to treat your daily struggle, like a step towards success, something bigger will come your way.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: I Have Learned Why People Work So Hard To Succeed: It Is Because They Envy The Things Their Neighbors Have. But It Is Useless. It Is Like Chasing The Wind....It Is Better To Have Only A Little, With Peace Of Mind, Than Be Busy All The Time With Both Hands, Trying To Catch The Wind
author: Anonymous

quote: When you fail, get hurt, feel bad, but act on it! Everybody fails, but the ones who act are the ones who change the world!
author: Vishwas Mudagal
category: failures that lead to success qoutes

quote: To succeed means you to sail across some difficult courses.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Becoming successful is a rough journey that carries pain and requires perseverance.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Faith is not mere belief but is that state you attain when you send your will, words, thoughts, beliefs, and actions into orbit around a chosen goal
author: Agona Apell, The Success Genome Unravelled: Turning Men from Rot to Rock
